name: Easy Dancer
description:
Easy Dancer!

Be better! Learn to input every 480 ms!

Simply click the game then input: press a key or click with to get started! Then wait for the bar to fill from the left until the blue bars are filled and input again!

This game has a [self] button that plays the game automatically! I have to figure out why it is early! It can be turned off by pressing escape or the [I!] button!
